mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where seq=#{seq}
update board set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step>#{step}
update board set reply=reply+1 where seq=#{pseq}
update board set reply=reply-1 where seq=(select pseq from board where seq=#{seq})
update board set subject = '[원글이 삭제된 답글]'||subject where pseq=#{seq}
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select seq,id,name,email,subject,content, ref,lev,step,pseq,reply,hit,logtime from board
where subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by ref desc, step asc)tt )where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select count(*) from board
where subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
